text:
Hiring Rails / JS engineer -- mainly using React.js / Rails / MongoDB / Golang

Nota, inc. is a profitable web startup with an office in Kyoto. Nota's https://gyazo.com screenshot app is used by nearly 10 million people every month and its new organized-for-you note service https://scrapbox.io is rapidly growing in popularity among developers, startups, and researchers.

We're looking for a rails/JS engineer to join our Kyoto office or work remotely but from the japan time zone. We have a casual and friendly work atmosphere with our CEO having lived in silicon valley for several years. Some japanese language is useful but not absolutely required!

Check out the job post: https://en-jp.wantedly.com/projects/171964 (it's in japanese so maybe you'll need to translate it)
